title: Chewy Needs to Teach Itself More Tricks
sub_head: The pet boom is waning, and so is investors’ love for Chewy
body:
Not unlike pandemic pets whose human companions are rediscovering the outside world, Chewy is having a harder time keeping its shareholders’ full attention.
Online pet retailer Chewy’s revenue in the quarter ended Oct. 31 grew at a healthy 24% from a year earlier, well within its own guidance and Wall Street expectations. The number of active customers grew almost 15%, also in line with expectations.
